subject: Math
text: Algebra is a branch of mathematics dealing with symbols and the rules for manipulating those symbols

subject: Math
text: Geometry is concerned with properties of space that are related with distance shape size and relative position of figures

subject: Science
text: Physics is the natural science that studies matter its motion and behavior through space and time

subject: Science
text: Chemistry is the scientific discipline involved with elements and compounds composed of atoms molecules and ions

subject: History
text: Ancient history is the aggregate of past events from the beginning of writing and recorded human history

subject: English
text: Grammar is the set of structural rules governing the composition of clauses phrases and words
